PolicyPage.Name: Pre-Pharmacy Society
PolicyPage.Title: Pre-Pharmacy Society
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
The Pre-Pharmcay Society is planning a trip to Idaho State University College of Pharmacy on June 19th! If you are interested in learning about how to get into pharmacy school, this is one trip that you will not want to miss. If you are interested in attending, please email hen09017@byui.edu or text 208-252-4363. You must send an RSVP if you wish to attend and we need to know as soon as possible, as the school needs an idea of how many will be in attendance. Lunch will be provided for those attending by ISU, and we will be receiving a tour of the univeristy. We have excused absence slips if you need one. We will be leaving at 10:00am Thursday morning, and returning no later than 5:30 pm. This is a great opportunity, and we strongly encourage all who are interested in pharmacy to attend!!!

The mission of the BYU-I Pre-Pharmacy Society is to encourage student interest in a career in pharmacology and generate awareness of pharmacy related opportunities, support and educate pre-pharmacy students regarding graduate school options, and provide students with opportunities to contribute to the Rexburg community. We are dedicated to strengthening the society of pre-pharmacy students at BYU-I by fostering a social and professional network of pre-health students that will continue throughout their health-care careers.     

Interested in Joining? 

Email: Pre-Pharmacy@byui.edu

Bi-Weekly Society Meetings Held:
Thursday in Benson 108 at 7:00 P.M.

                                                        Like us on Facebook!
